{"message": "Dear Bob,
I am delighted to present our premier product, which I believe holds immense value for you at $1,000,000. This exceptional item is not just a purchase but an investment in quality and excellence. Given its worth to you, I am offering it to you at this exclusive price. Should you choose to accept this offer, you will be securing a piece that is both valuable and highly sought after.

Please let me know if you would like to proceed with this offer. I am here to assist you every step of the way.

Best regards,
Alice", "product_price": 1000000}
